name: Tunnel Defence
description:
The game is a platformer x tower defence.

Collect blood to place structures (towers) to defend yourself.

Towers can only be placed once you have filled the blood bar.

There are 3 towers.

1. Respawner: If you die youll respawn back at the nearest respawner.

2. Spikes: Damages enemies in an area.

3. Shooter: Shoots enemies one at a time. (the only tower that upgrades, growing sight area)
